channel.title: Twitter got owned
channel.description:
For whoever doesn't know what twitter is, it's sort of like myspace. An 18 year old hacker brute forced a twitter admin's account, and had access to every twitter account in existence, including Barack Obama, Fox News, and Hannah Montana. (Yay!)
Full Article: (Jan 6)
[url=http://blog.wired.com/27bstroke6/2009/01/professed-twitt.html]http://blog.wired.com/27bstroke6/2009/01/professed-twitt.html[/url]
[Quote]Someone used the Obama account to send out a message urging supporters to click on a link to take a survey about the president-elect, and be eligible to win $500 in gasoline. A fake message sent to followers of the Fox News Twitter feed announced that Fox host Bill O'Reilly "is gay," while a message from Britney Spears' feed made lewd comments about the singer.[/quote] [Quote]GMZ, who said he's been hacking for about three years and is currently studying game development, said he conducted the dictionary attack using a script he wrote and used last November to break into the YouTube account of teen queen Miley Cyrus.
That hack gained widespread attention when someone posted a video memorial to Cyrus on the account, claiming Cyrus had died in a car accident. GMZ said a friend of his was responsible for the hoax. [/quote]

item.title: Twitter got owned
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

“Hacker” and “brute force” shouldn’t be used in the same sentence, let alone next to each other.

Read full topic

item.title: Twitter got owned
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

Heh, the message posted on Britney Spears’ and Fox’ twitter was funny.

Twitter sucks anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Twitter got owned
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

For whoever doesn’t know what twitter is, it’s sort of like myspace. An 18 year old hacker brute forced a twitter admin’s account, and had access to every twitter account in existence, including Barack Obama, Fox News, and Hannah Montana. (Yay!)

Full Article: (Jan 6)

http://blog.wired.com/27bstroke6/2009/01/professed-twitt.html

Someone used the Obama account to send out a message urging supporters to click on a link to take a survey about the president-elect, and be eligible to win $500 in gasoline. A fake message sent to followers of the Fox News Twitter feed announced that Fox host Bill O’Reilly “is gay,” while a message from Britney Spears’ feed made lewd comments about the singer.

[Quote]GMZ, who said he’s been hacking for about three years and is currently studying game development, said he conducted the dictionary attack using a script he wrote and used last November to break into the YouTube account of teen queen Miley Cyrus.

That hack gained widespread attention when someone posted a video memorial to Cyrus on the account, claiming Cyrus had died in a car accident. GMZ said a friend of his was responsible for the hoax. [/quote]

Read full topic
